item.title: 美国银行称，现金流入创 2023 年 3 月以来最大单周流入量
item.description: 据美国银行周五发布的一份报告显示，截至本周三的一周内，投资者投入了1,364亿美元现金，这是自2023年3月以来最大的单周流入量，当时市场受到地区银行业危机的冲击。【原文：Investors ploughed $136.4 billion into cash in the week to Wednesday, the biggest weekly inflow since March 2023, when markets were rattled by a regional banking crisis, according to a report from Bank of America on Friday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司 11 月交付 84 架飞机
item.description: 在经历了夏季的低迷之后，空中客车公司在 11 月份交付了 84 架飞机，朝着年底目标又迈进了一步。【原文：Airbus delivered 84 planes in November as the planemaker moved back towards end-year targets after a downturn over the summer.】

item.title: 天然气价格冲击将加剧欧洲工业的痛苦
item.description: 随着寒冷天气消耗掉库存，与亚洲争夺液化天然气的竞争加剧，以及俄罗斯供应减少的前景日益逼近，欧洲陷入困境的工业正准备在即将到来的冬季迎接新一轮天然气价格冲击。【原文：Europe's struggling industries are bracing for a new gas price shock over the coming winter months, as colder weather depletes stocks, competition with Asia for liquefied natural gas intensifies, and the prospect of reduced Russian supplies looms.】

item.title: Holcim 计划分拆美国公司在瑞士上市
item.description: 瑞士建材生产商 Holcim 周五表示，明年将北美业务分拆给股东时，除计划在纽约上市外，还将在瑞士证券交易所上市。【原文：Holcim will list shares in its North American business on the SIX Swiss stock exchange in addition to the planned New York flotation when it is spun off to shareholders next year, the Swiss building materials maker said on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普推动交易反弹，投行看好 2025 年收入热潮
item.description: 路透社的数据显示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫将推动交易复兴，明年全球投资银行业务收入将增至3160亿美元，比2024年增长约5.7%。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump's return to the White House is seen fuelling a dealmaking revival that could bolster investment banking income to $316 billion globally next year, a jump of about 5.7% on 2024, data seen by Reuters shows.】

item.title: 早间竞价风险警惕的市场倒计时招聘
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英国雷诺兹称与美国的平衡贸易降低了特朗普征收关税的风险
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引英国商业部长乔纳森-雷诺兹（Jonathan Reynolds）的话报道称，英国与美国的平衡贸易应能降低美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对英国产品征收关税的风险。【原文：Britain's balanced trade with the U.S. should reduce the risk of tariffs that President-elect Donald Trump will introduce on its products, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing the country's business minister Jonathan Reynolds.】

item.title: 在韩国的危机手册中，货币稳定至关重要
item.description: 在韩国总统尹锡烈于周二晚宣布戒严令，使韩国陷入数十年来最严重的危机后几分钟，他的财政部长就惊呆了，他知道自己的首要任务是：全力以赴捍卫货币。【原文：Minutes after South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol declared martial law on Tuesday night, plunging the country into its worst crisis in decades, his stunned finance minister knew his priorities: throw everything at defending the currency.】

item.title: 压力重重欧洲央行的五个问题
item.description: 随着通胀率走低，欧洲央行下周似乎将再次降息，而金融市场则希望了解，更具挑战性的环境是否会加快降息步伐。【原文：The European Central Bank looks set to cut rates again next week as inflation heads down, and financial markets are keen for a sense of whether a more challenging environment will spark speedier moves ahead.】

item.title: 波音公司员工回国，飓风过后，美国 11 月就业人数出现增长
item.description: 在受到飓风和罢工的严重制约之后，11 月份美国的就业增长可能出现了猛增，但这可能并不意味着劳动力市场的宽松状况出现了实质性转变，从而使美联储能够在本月再次降息。【原文：U.S. job growth likely surged in November after being severely constrained by hurricanes and strikes, but this probably does not signal a material shift in easing labor market conditions that should allow the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates again this month.】

item.title: 日本央行对 12 月加息持谨慎态度
item.description: 鉴于消费疲软、日本央行行长谨慎的决策风格以及对特朗普第二任总统任期内美国经济政策的担忧，日本央行对下次加息的时间保持警惕，12 月加息几乎没有悬念。【原文：The Bank of Japan is staying guarded on the timing of the next rate hike with December hardly a done deal given soft consumption, its governor's cautious decision-making style and anxiety over U.S. economic policy in a second Trump presidency.】

item.title: 俄新社报道：俄罗斯官员称特朗普威胁不会停止金砖国家支付系统工作
item.description: 俄罗斯卫星通讯社周五援引一位俄罗斯高级官员的话说，尽管美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对试图削弱美元的国家征收100%的进口关税，但金砖国家结算系统的工作仍将继续。【原文：Work will continue on the BRICS settlement system despite U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's threat to impose 100% import duties on countries that try to undermine the dollar, the RIA news agency cited a senior Russian official as saying on Friday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因韩国风险而下滑，美元在非农数据公布前保持警惕
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市因韩国政局动荡而下滑，而美元多头则焦急地等待着美国非农就业数据是否会挑战或巩固本月降息的预期。【原文：Asian stocks slipped on Friday on political ructions in South Korea, while dollar bulls waited anxiously to see if U.S. payrolls challenged or cemented expectations of a rate cut this month.】

item.title: 欧佩克+延长供应削减凸显需求疲软，油价下跌
item.description: 周五亚市早盘，油价下滑，需求疲软成为焦点，此前欧佩克+组织推迟了增加供应的计划，并将深度减产延长至2026年底。【原文：Oil prices slipped in early Asian trading on Friday, with weak demand in focus after the OPEC+ group postponed planned supply increases and extended deep output cuts to the end of 2026.】

item.title: 汇市在政治动荡中寻求稳定，关注美国就业报告
item.description: 法国政府垮台，韩国短暂实施戒严令，本周政治局势动荡不安，市场在考虑其影响的同时，主要货币在周五趋于稳定。【原文：Major currencies steadied on Friday as markets considered the impact of a politically turbulent week that saw the collapse of France's government and the brief imposition of martial law in South Korea.】

item.title: 路透调查：澳大利亚央行将在 12 月维持利率稳定，首次降息将推迟至第二季度
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）调查的经济学家认为，澳大利亚央行周二将维持利率稳定，因为有韧性的劳动力市场使通胀率保持高位，他们将首次降息的时间预测推至明年第二季度。【原文：Australia's central bank will hold interest rates steady on Tuesday as a resilient labour market keeps inflation elevated, according to economists polled by Reuters who pushed forecasts for the first cut to the second quarter of next year.】

item.title: 意大利称签署欧盟-南方共同市场贸易协定不附带任何条件
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）办公室的官员周四表示，意大利认为签署欧盟与南美洲南方共同市场集团之间的贸易协议不存在任何条件。【原文：Italy believes there are no conditions for signing off on a trade deal between the European Union and South America's Mercosur bloc, officials from Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni's office said on Thursday.】

item.title: 花旗集团高管：特朗普放宽监管将引发日本对外并购
item.description: 尽管美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普反对新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel）试图收购美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel），但日本花旗集团（Citigroup）副董事长表示，在即将上任的特朗普政府领导下，日本公司在美国的收购将更容易获得批准。【原文：Japanese companies will find it easier to gain approval for U.S. acquisitions under the incoming Trump administration, the vice chairman of Citigroup in Japan said, even as President-elect Donald Trump opposes Nippon Steel's attempted buyout of U.S. Steel.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构采取行动遏制加密货币的非法使用
item.description: 澳大利亚监控金融犯罪的机构周五表示，它已成立了一个内部加密货币特别工作组，以识别和打击不遵守该国反洗钱法的加密货币 ATM 提供商。【原文：Australia's agency for monitoring financial crimes said on Friday it had established an internal cryptocurrency task force to identify and take action against crypto ATM providers that do not comply with the country's anti-money laundering laws.】

item.title: Ulta Beauty 上调年度利润预期，股价上涨
item.description: 化妆品零售商 Ulta Beauty 周四上调了年度利润预期，表明假日购物季对香水和化妆品的需求出现反弹，股价在盘后交易中上涨超过 11.5%。【原文：Cosmetics retailer Ulta Beauty raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday, signaling a bounce back in demand for perfumes and makeup during the holiday shopping season and sending its shares up more than 11.5% in aftermarket trading.】

item.title: 巴西指控大众汽车公司几十年前将农场工人当奴隶对待
item.description: 巴西劳工检察官周四表示，他们指控大众汽车当地部门在几十年前对农场工人施加了类似奴役的条件，并要求其赔偿 1.65 亿雷亚尔（2750 万美元）。【原文：Brazilian labor prosecutors charged Volkswagen's local unit with subjecting farm workers to conditions akin to slavery decades ago and are seeking 165 million reais ($27.5 million) in damages, they said on Thursday.】

item.title: 花旗集团晋升 344 名高管为董事总经理
item.description: 花旗集团周四宣布，29 个国家的 344 名高管晋升为董事总经理（MD），这是花旗集团的高级官员头衔。【原文：Citigroup on Thursday announced the promotion of 344 executives in 29 countries to managing directors, known as MD, the bank's higher officer title.】

item.title: 共同基金先驱 MFS 投资管理公司推出首批 ETF
item.description: MFS 投资管理公司是一家总部位于波士顿的资产管理公司，曾在一个世纪前推出世界上第一只开放式共同基金，该公司本周四将推出五只交易所交易基金，进军交易所交易基金领域。【原文：MFS Investment Management, the Boston-based asset manager that unveiled the world's first open-ended mutual fund a century ago, is making a foray into exchange-traded funds with the launch of five ETFs on Thursday.】

item.title: 惠普企业因人工智能服务器需求强劲，季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 惠普企业公司（Hewlett Packard Enterprise）周四公布的第四季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，原因是该公司用于支持人工智能应用的服务器需求强劲。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter revenue and profit on Thursday, as it benefits from strong demand for its servers used to power artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: 早间竞标：印度加息成焦点，政治危机降温
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 雪佛龙第四季度将承担高达 15 亿美元的费用
item.description: 美国石油生产商雪佛龙公司（Chevron）周四表示，该公司第四季度将因重组、资产减值和财产出售成本而承担高达 15 亿美元的费用。【原文：U.S. oil producer Chevron on Thursday said it will take up to $1.5 billion in fourth-quarter charges for restructuring, asset impairments and property sales costs.】

item.title: Lululemon 上调全年收入预期
item.description: Lululemon Athletica 周四上调了年度营收预期，押注假日购物季期间美国市场对其运动服装的需求将有所恢复。【原文：Lululemon Athletica raised its annual revenue forecast on Thursday betting on resilient demand for its athletic wear in the United States during the holiday shopping season.】

item.title: FAA 管理员称波音公司在罢工后仍未生产 MAX 飞机
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局局长周四表示，波音公司在机械师罢工后尚未恢复生产 737 MAX 飞机，但计划在本月晚些时候开始生产。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said on Thursday that Boeing has not yet resumed producing 737 MAX airplanes following a machinists strike, but plans to begin later this month.】

item.title: 肥胖症药物需求激增，礼来投资 30 亿美元扩建威斯康星工厂
item.description: 礼来公司周四表示，它将投资 30 亿美元扩建今年早些时候在威斯康星州 Pleasant Prairie 购买的生产厂，以满足对其减肥药和糖尿病药物不断飙升的需求。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Thursday it will invest $3 billion to expand the manufacturing plant it bought in Pleasant Prairie, Wisconsin earlier this year, as it scrambles to meet soaring demand for its weight-loss and diabetes drugs.】

item.title: OpenAI 推出价值 200 美元的用于研究的 ChatGPT 订阅服务
item.description: OpenAI 周四推出了一款广受欢迎的聊天机器人 ChatGPT，售价为每月 200 美元，可用于工程领域和研究，这家人工智能公司希望扩大其技术的行业应用。【原文：OpenAI on Thursday launched a version of its popular chatbot ChatGPT priced at $200 per month, which can be used in engineering fields and for research, as the AI firm looks to expand industry applications for its technology.】
